Uses of Interface
uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.direct.RenderCallback

  • Packages that use RenderCallback 
    Package Description
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.component
    Provides higher-level components used to create basic media players with the minimum of application code.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player
    This is the main package for vlcj client applications, providing the classes necessary to create and control native media players and associated resources.
    uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.direct
    Provides the classes necessary to support direct access to the native video frame buffer.

    • Uses of RenderCallback in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.component

      Classes in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.component that implement RenderCallback 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DirectMediaPlayerComponent
      Encapsulation of a direct-rendering media player.

    • Uses of RenderCallback in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DirectMediaPlayer MediaPlayerFactory.newDirectMediaPlayer(BufferFormatCallback bufferFormatCallback, RenderCallback renderCallback)
      Create a new direct video rendering media player.

    • Uses of RenderCallback in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.direct

      Classes in uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.direct that implement RenderCallback 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  RenderCallbackAdapter
      A render call-back adapter implementation that fills an array of RGB integer data for an entire video frame.
